name: Candy Cart
description:
Candy Cart is an arcade game designed to be played with a gyroscope.

The goal is to gather a maximum amount of pastries in your cart. You move by rotating your phone on the left or the right. You can jump if you rotate it towards you.

This game has been made in a 30 hours Game Jam hosted in our school : ETPA/ESMA. The theme was "Cart" or "Charrette" in french.

Keep in mind that the current highscore is around 2800 ;)

We hope that you'll like it,

The Candy Cart's team.

Angelo Pinho : ItchIO ;

Sacha Yerle : ItchIO ;

Mickael Starantino : ItchIO  and ArtStation;
